title: Book of Curses
description: Alternate cover edition of ISBN 9781452482675Meet Raine Renning, your average teenager with her very own twin brother, Thomas Renning. Their lives are pretty normal - if you count moving from house to house, and town to town, normal.Since the death of their father Leland, their mother Tori has shown her true colors. Working as a hooker and bringing home men only to make more money for her body upgrades.On the day of their 18th birthday Tom decides to have his ex-girlfriend and best friend Christie come over for a small party and gives Raine her gift - the one that will change all their lives forever. A book - While reading what's written inside of it joking around with it, they're pulled within its curse bound pages and told the prophecy they are to fulfill.Vampyres. Faeries. Lycans.Creatures that were only thought about in stories and myths take their places as the Renning Guardians as the pair travel from region to region. Join them as they learn more and more and more about it all.Dragon's. Human's. Nephilim.Now, if only they can figure out how to take down four god's in the process of this entire mess and still save their world from destruction - Oh and don't forget the picking an immortal creature to become...
author: L.D. Hutchinson
